name: Request Plugin
description: Allow users to request movies and TV shows with admin management and status tracking
overview: A comprehensive request management system for Jellyfin. Users can submit requests for movies and TV shows through a floating button accessible from any page. Admins can view all requests, change statuses (Pending, Processing, Complete), and manage the request queue. Regular users see only their own requests and status updates.

versions.changelog:
Initial release:
- Floating button UI on all pages
- Request submission form
- Admin request management panel
- Status tracking (Pending/Processing/Complete)
- User-specific views
- Thread-safe JSON data storage
